description:
Kageroza, having regained his complete powers, sets out to kill the Hollowfied Ichigo when Rukia, Uryu, Renji, Chad, and Orihime arrive to stop him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigo o Mamore! Nakama-tachi no Kizuna!
Protect Ichigo! The Bonds of Friends!
Protéger Ichigo. Le Lien de l`amitié
一護を護れ! 仲間たちの絆!
